findings.title: Consider using Uniswap V2 price oracle
findings.description: It is possible to manipulate the token price on pooled-exchanges such as Uniswap and Kyber, which can lead to attacks. The updateTokenPrice() function call could be front-run to manipulate the cached token price.

findings.title: BaseSubAccount.sol: Functions TokenReturnAmount and tokenWithdrawable do not implement functionality for ETH
findings.description: Functions `TokenReturnAmount`  and  `tokenWithdrawable`  do not implement functionality for ETH, which implies that currently deposited Ether will not be withdrawable and will remain effectively frozen after deposit.
